ibis.io
Interface DataOutput

All Known Subinterfaces:
SerializationOutput
All Known Implementing Classes:
BufferedArrayOutputStream, ByteSerializationOutputStream, DataOutputStream, DataOutputStreamSplitter, DataSerializationOutputStream, IbisSerializationOutputStream, SunSerializationOutputStream
public interface DataOutput

The DataOutput interface provides methods to write data.

Method Summary
